text: Loxstedt is a municipality in Cuxhaven district, Germany. There are 21 villages in the municipality. On 31 December 2012, 15,841 people lived there. Loxstedt has a railway station. The Autobahn A27 runs through it. The Weser tunnel also is in the area of Loxstedt, near the village of Dedesdorf. ==References== Category:Cuxhaven (district)
title: Loxstedt
